Here are some facts about 404:

  • 404 is 110010100 in binary
  • 404 is the sum of 2 squares: 2 and 20
  • 404 divides 91^4-1
  • 404 has 21 different types of suberrors
  • 404 takes about 3 minutes to count to (starting from 1)
  • 404 in coordinates as 40 degrees North and 4 degrees West points to the Spanish Island of Menorca in the Mediterranean
  • 404 in hexadecimal makes this color.(#194)
